Body: I recently stumbled upon these two concepts relaxed and na(t)ïve orthography, but I don't really known how to used them properly, any advise would be welcomed, thanks.
Title: What is the difference between a relaxed orthography and a na(t)Ïve orthography?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: My interests are the Computer Science, Language Learning, Natural Language Processing. As you can deduce I apply all I learn to develop applications for Language Learning and the protection of indigenous languages. I currently work for a small software company as a programmer.
